trans-unit.source: Implements low-level personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: Operações de personalização de baixo nível implementa.

trans-unit.source: This class implements the logic required to carry out lower-level personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe implementa a lógica necessária para executar operações de personalização de nível inferior.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class manages the high-level life cycle of personalization, it is the WebPartPersonalization class that is responsible for actually implementing the physical steps necessary to carry out specific personalization actions.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe gerencia o ciclo de vida de alto nível de personalização, é a classe WebPartPersonalization que é responsável por implementar realmente físicas etapas necessárias para executar ações específicas de personalização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartPersonalization class in turn relies on an implementation of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> to communicate with the underlying data store for personalization information.
trans-unit.target: A classe WebPartPersonalization por sua vez se baseia em uma implementação de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>para se comunicar com o repositório de dados subjacente para obter informações de personalização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: If you use the default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, it creates an instance of the WebPartPersonalization class that you can use by referencing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar a implementação padrão da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, ele cria uma instância da classe WebPartPersonalization que você pode usar referenciando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property, you would specify `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para acessar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>propriedade, você deve especificar `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an instance of this class and associates it with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on whose behalf the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance will carry out personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa uma instância dessa classe e o associa a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle em cujo nome o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>instância executará operações de personalização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> used to manage the personalization information
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> usado para gerenciar as informações de personalização

trans-unit.source: owner is .
trans-unit.target: owneris .

trans-unit.source: Applies personalization data to the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se os dados de personalização para o pai <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>está definida como `true`, este método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A>método na <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>instância para aplicar o estado de personalização para o controle de Web Parts fornecido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applies personalization data to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control when requested to do so by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se os dados de personalização especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlar quando solicitado pelo pai <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This method is called to apply personalization data to an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>-derived class when requested to do so by the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado para aplicar os dados de personalização para um indivíduo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>-quando solicitado pelo pai de classe derivada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>está definida como `true`, este método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A>método na <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>instância para aplicar o estado de personalização para o controle de Web Parts fornecido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to which personalization data is to be applied.
trans-unit.target: As Web Parts controlar a personalização de quais dados a ser aplicado.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to apply personalization state to a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa para aplicar o estado de personalização para um controle de Web Parts que não é gerenciado pelo pai <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the user is authorized to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o usuário está autorizado a inserir <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> escopo.

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` if the user is authorized in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> to enter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna `true` se o usuário está autorizado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>Inserir <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>escopo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: The first time the property is called, it determines the user's right to enter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope and caches the information.
trans-unit.target: Na primeira vez que a propriedade é chamada, ele determina do direito inserir o usuário <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>escopo e armazena em cache as informações.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A> dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not shown on subsequent calls to this property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>dicionário é modificado depois da primeira vez que esta propriedade é chamada, as alterações não são mostradas em chamadas subsequentes para essa propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is authorized to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o usuário está autorizado a inserir <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> escopo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Changes the current page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> instance to the scope specified.
trans-unit.target: Altera a página atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> instância para o escopo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the currently executing page's personalization scope to the new scope specified by the `newScope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esse método altera o escopo de personalização da página em execução no momento para o novo escopo especificado pelo `newScope` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This method is the protected helper method that is called by the public <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é o método auxiliar protegido que é chamado pelo público <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: This protected method exists to handle future extensibility if there are more than two possible scopes to switch between.
trans-unit.target: Este método protegido existe para lidar com extensibilidade futura, se houver mais de dois escopos possíveis para alternar entre.

trans-unit.source: If the current scope and `newScope` are the same value, then this method performs no operation.
trans-unit.target: Se o escopo atual e `newScope` são o mesmo valor, esse método não executa nenhuma operação.

trans-unit.source: The new personalization scope for the current page.
trans-unit.target: O novo escopo de personalização para a página atual.

trans-unit.source: If attempting to switch from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope, the current user does not have the user capability to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Se a tentativa de alternar de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> escopo para <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> escopo, o usuário atual não tem a capacidade de usuário insira <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> escopo.

trans-unit.source: scope is not a valid member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: scopenão é um membro válido do enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Extracts the personalization state from one Web Parts control and applies it to a second Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Extrai o estado de personalização de um controle de Web Parts e aplica-se a um segundo controle de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: This method extracts the personalization state from `webPartA` and applies it to `webPartB`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método extrai o estado de personalização de `webPartA` e se aplica a `webPartB`.

trans-unit.source: This method assumes that `webPartA` and `webPartB` are the same type.
trans-unit.target: Este método assume que `webPartA` e `webPartB` são do mesmo tipo.

trans-unit.source: If the Web Parts controls are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls, the method copies the personalization state from the child control wrapped in `webPartA` to the child control wrapped in `webPartB`.
trans-unit.target: Se os controles de Web Parts são <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controles, o método copia o estado de personalização do controle filho encapsulado em `webPartA` para o controle filho encapsulado em `webPartB`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: As part of the copy operation, `webPartB` is marked as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Como parte da operação de cópia, `webPartB` está marcado como "sujos".

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control supplying the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: O controle de Web Parts fornecendo os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control receiving the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: O controle de Web Parts recebendo os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: Either webPartA or webPartB is .
trans-unit.target: Either webPartA or webPartB is .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se a personalização é solicitada para ser habilitado para o associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade indica se a personalização é solicitada para ser habilitado para o pai <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Note that this is a subtle but important distinction from the intent of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Observe que esta é uma distinção sutil, mas importante da tentativa de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida antes da conclusão do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In practice, this means that the Enabled property must be set in the page markup on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element if personalization should be disabled.
trans-unit.target: Na prática, isso significa que a propriedade Enabled deve ser definida na marcação da página no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>elemento se personalização deve ser desabilitada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, essa propriedade pode ser definida durante a `PreInit` fase do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if personalization is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a personalização está ativada. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property value after the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*> method had completed.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa para definir o valor dessa propriedade após associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>método já tinha sido concluída.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance has completed initialization or that the current user has rights to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Garante que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> instância concluiu a inicialização ou o usuário atual tem direitos para modificar o estado de personalização.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating which type of check should be made.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica qual tipo de verificação deve ser feito.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> instance of a user's authorization to enter <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> instância de autorização do usuário para inserir <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> escopo.

trans-unit.source: The user right is represented by the string "enterSharedScope" in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance.
trans-unit.target: O direito de usuário é representado pela cadeia de caracteres "enterSharedScope" no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>instância.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Extracts personalization data from the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Extrai dados de personalização do pai <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control during its <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>está definida como `true`, e o estado de personalização não está sendo redefinido durante a solicitação de página (como quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>é de propriedade `false`), em seguida, esse método extrai dados de personalização do pai <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlar durante seu <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to extract personalization state from the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A>método o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>instância para extrair o estado de personalização do pai <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: Extracts personalization data from a Web Parts control when requested to do so by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Extrai dados de personalização de um controle de Web Parts quando solicitado pelo pai <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the Web Parts control specified by `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>está definida como `true`, e o estado de personalização não está sendo redefinido durante a solicitação de página (como quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>é de propriedade `false`), em seguida, esse método extrai dados de personalização do controle de Web Parts especificado pelo `webPart`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to extract personalization state from the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A>método o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>instância para extrair o estado de personalização do controle de Web Parts fornecido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control containing personalization data to be extracted.
trans-unit.target: As Web Parts de controle que contém dados de personalização a ser extraído.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to extract personalization state from a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa para extrair o estado de personalização de um controle de Web Parts que não é gerenciado pelo pai <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o filtro de autorização, se houver, associado com o controle de Web Parts especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the Web Parts control identified by `webPartID`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método recupera o filtro de autorização, se houver, associado com o controle de Web Parts identificado pela `webPartID`.

trans-unit.source: Each Web Parts control that is serialized and managed by personalization is associated with a `webPartID` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Cada controle de Web Parts que seja serializado e gerenciado pelo personalização está associado com um `webPartID` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: At run time, a page's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control can filter the controls displayed on a page by determining whether each Web Parts control is authorized.
trans-unit.target: No tempo de execução, uma página da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle pode filtrar os controles exibidos em uma página, determinando se cada controle de Web Parts está autorizado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This authorization information is stored as a string in the data associated with each Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Essas informações de autorização são armazenadas como uma cadeia de caracteres nos dados associados a cada controle de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the Web Parts control associated with the filter to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: A ID do controle de Web Parts associado com o filtro a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: O filtro de autorização para o controle de Web Parts especificado.

trans-unit.source: webPartID is or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: webPartIDé ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current page and personalization scope have associated personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se a página atual e o escopo de personalização tem associado os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: This is a convenient method for determining whether the current page and scope combination has personalization data associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Este é um método conveniente para determinar se a combinação de página e o escopo atual tem dados de personalização associados a ele.

trans-unit.source: Internally, the method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A> on the provider to determine whether data exists.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, as chamadas de método <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>no provedor para determinar se existem dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the page has personalization data associated with it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a página tem os dados de personalização associados a ele; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o escopo de personalização padrão.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the default personalization scope that should be used for the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the absence of previous knowledge about the proper scope.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa o escopo de personalização padrão que deve ser usado para o pai <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle na ausência de dados de Conhecimento anterior sobre o escopo apropriado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: If this property is not explicitly set, it defaults to returning <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade não é definida explicitamente, o padrão é retornar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>escopo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida antes da conclusão do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In practice, this means InitialScope must be set in the page markup on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element.
trans-unit.target: Na prática, isso significa InitialScope deve ser definida na marcação da página no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, essa propriedade pode ser definida durante a `PreInit` fase do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> indicating the default personalization scope of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> indicando que o escopo de personalização de padrão de associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*> method had completed.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa de definir esta propriedade para um valor diferente de seu valor atual após associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>método já tinha sido concluída.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set a value of InitialScope that is not a member of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa para definir um valor de InitialScope não é um membro do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a personalização está habilitada e carregado com êxito os dados de personalização para esta instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Prior to loading personalization data, this property will always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de carregar os dados de personalização, essa propriedade sempre retornará `false`.

trans-unit.source: For example, this property will return `false` during the `PreInit` phase.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, esta propriedade retornará `false` durante o `PreInit` fase.

trans-unit.source: After the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>'s <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method has successfully completed (during which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method is called), this property will then return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Depois de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método foi concluída com êxito (durante o qual o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>método é chamado), essa propriedade retornará `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This property is a publicly accessible alias for the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é um alias publicamente acessível para protegido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if personalization is enabled for the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance and personalization data has successfully loaded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a personalização foi ativada para o atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> com êxito os dados de instância e personalização têm carregado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a personalização está habilitada e carregado com êxito os dados de personalização para esta instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If the personalization feature is enabled (if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A> property is set to `true`), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance is considered initialized immediately after the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>'s <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method has successfully completed (during which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method is called).
trans-unit.target: Se o recurso de personalização está habilitado (se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A>está definida como `true`), o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>instância será considerada inicializado imediatamente após associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método foi concluída com êxito (durante o qual o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>método é chamado).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Prior to loading personalization data, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de carregar os dados de personalização, essa propriedade sempre retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if personalization is initialized for this instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a personalização é inicializada para esta instância; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current user is authorized to modify state information.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o usuário atual está autorizado a modificar as informações de estado.

trans-unit.source: The first time this property is called, it caches the result of determining the user’s right to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Na primeira vez em que esta propriedade é chamada, ele armazena em cache o resultado de determinar o direito de usuário para modificar o estado de personalização.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A> dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not reflected in subsequent calls to this property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>dicionário for modificado depois da primeira vez que essa propriedade é chamada, as alterações não são refletidas nas chamadas subsequentes para essa propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is authorized to modify state information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o usuário está autorizado a modificar as informações de estado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes personalization.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a personalização.

trans-unit.source: This is the main entry point for initializing personalization information on behalf of the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Este é o ponto de entrada principal para inicializar as informações de personalização em nome do pai <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This method is called during the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante o pai <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Normally, if personalization has been disabled on the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, this method will never be called.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, se a personalização foi desabilitada no pai <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle, este método nunca será chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: During the course of this method, the following initializations occur: - A reference to either the default personalization provider, or the custom provider indicated in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> page markup or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A> property, is obtained.
trans-unit.target: Durante esse método, ocorrem as seguintes inicializações: - A referência como o provedor de personalização padrão ou o provedor personalizado indicado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>marcação de página ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A>propriedade, é obtida.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: - The provider is called to determine the user capabilities (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>) for the currently executing user.
trans-unit.target: -O provedor é chamado para determinar os recursos do usuário (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>) para o usuário atualmente em execução.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The personalization state for the current page/user/scope combination is loaded from the underlying data store by the provider (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>) and stored within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance.
trans-unit.target: -O estado de personalização para a combinação de página/usuário/escopo atual é carregado do armazenamento de dados subjacente pelo provedor (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>) e armazenados dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>instância.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The personalization scope for the current page/user/scope is determined by the provider (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>).
trans-unit.target: -O escopo de personalização de página/usuário/escopo atual é determinado pelo provedor (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the result of this determination might be different than the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o resultado dessa determinação pode ser diferente do valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: The scope value returned from this method is used as the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de escopo retornado deste método é usado como o valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception due to personalization not being enabled will occur only if the Load method is called directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>exceção devido a personalização não está habilitada ocorrerá somente se o método de carga é chamado diretamente.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the load, and this helper method silently returns if personalization has not been enabled for the page.
trans-unit.target: Na implementação do ASP.NET, um método auxiliar interno é chamado para executar o carregamento e esse método auxiliar silenciosamente retorna se a personalização não foi habilitada para a página.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> instance for the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> instância pai <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The underlying personalization providers failed to initialize because a default provider could not be found or because a failure occurred while attempting to initialize a personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: Os provedores de personalização subjacente não inicializou porque um provedor padrão não pôde ser encontrado ou porque ocorreu uma falha durante a tentativa de inicializar um provedor de personalização.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> instance of a user's authorization to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> instância de autorização do usuário para modificar o estado de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The user right is represented by the string "modifyState" in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance.
trans-unit.target: O direito de usuário é representado pela cadeia de caracteres "modifyState" no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>instância.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the provider name for personalization.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do provedor de personalização.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value set for this property in the page declaration.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna o valor definido para essa propriedade na declaração da página.

trans-unit.source: If this property was not set, it returns <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade não foi definida, ele retornará <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the page uses the default personalization provider specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, a página usa o provedor de personalização padrão especificado no arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só pode ser definida antes da conclusão do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This means the ProviderName property must be set in the page declaration on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que a propriedade ProviderName deve ser definida na declaração de página no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, essa propriedade pode ser definida durante a `PreInit` fase.

trans-unit.source: The name of the personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: O nome do provedor de personalização.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*> method has completed.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa de definir esta propriedade para um valor diferente de seu valor atual após o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>método foi concluída.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: Resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Redefine os dados de personalização para a página atual, o escopo e o usuário no repositório de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This method resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Este método redefine os dados de personalização para a página atual, o escopo e o usuário no repositório de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: As a side effect of the reset, the currently executing page is re-executed by a <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Como um efeito colateral da redefinição, a página em execução no momento é executada novamente, um <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>chame.</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this transfer re-executes the current page as a `GET` request regardless of how the page was originally requested.
trans-unit.target: Observe que essa transferência executa novamente a página atual como um `GET` solicitação, independentemente de como a página foi solicitada originalmente.

trans-unit.source: This method can be called at any time.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pode ser chamado a qualquer momento.

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the ResetPersonalizationState method on the provider.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, este método chama o método ResetPersonalizationState no provedor.

trans-unit.source: After data is successfully reset, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Depois de dados são redefinidos com êxito, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is used elsewhere by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance to bypass extracting personalization data from control properties and saving it if data has already been reset.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é usada em outro lugar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>instância para ignorar a extração de dados de personalização de propriedades de controle e salvá-lo se os dados já tem sido redefinidos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> instância não pode fazer referência a um provedor de personalização válido.

trans-unit.source: Saves personalization data for the current page, scope, and user to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Salva os dados de personalização para a página atual, o escopo e o usuário para o repositório de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Internally, the method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A> method on the provider.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, o método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A>método no provedor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to save personalization data when the currently executing user does not have the capability called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability> (within the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance) results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de salvar os dados de personalização quando o usuário atualmente em execução não tem o recurso denominado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>(no atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>instância) resulta em uma <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>exceção.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: Note that this would only be true if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control called the protected Save method directly.
trans-unit.target: Observe que isso só será verdadeiro se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle chamado protegido diretamente o método Save.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the save, and this helper method silently returns if the currently executing user does not have rights to modify data.
trans-unit.target: Na implementação do ASP.NET, um método auxiliar interno, na verdade, é chamado para executar o salvamento e esse método auxiliar silenciosamente retorna se o usuário atualmente em execução não tem direitos para modificar dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current personalization scope for the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o escopo de personalização atual para o pai <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This value is initially set based on the value returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é inicialmente definido com base no valor retornado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value can be modified by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor pode ser modificado por chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this represents the scope used for applying and extracting personalization information.
trans-unit.target: Observe que isso representa o escopo usado para aplicar e extrair informações de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property might differ from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade pode diferir do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> instance indicating the scope of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> instância que indica o escopo de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Marks the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Marca pai <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controle como tendo dados de personalização que foi alterada (é "sujos").

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>está definida como `true`, esse método marca pai <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle como "sujos".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method might invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo dos detalhes da implementação de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>a instância do controle de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, esse método pode invocar as verificações de segurança e verificações de permissão de segurança de acesso de código.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, este método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control tracks "dirty" state internally and exposes the "dirtiness" of the manager through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> property rather than through this method.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle controla o estado de "sujo" internamente e expõe "dirtiness" do Gerenciador por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A>propriedade em vez de usar esse método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de personalização não foi carregados.

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified Web Parts control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Marca o controle de Web Parts especificado como tendo dados de personalização que foi alterada (é "sujos").

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the specified Web Parts control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>está definida como `true`, esse método marca o controle de Web Parts especificado como "sujos".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method may invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo dos detalhes da implementação de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>a instância do controle de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, esse método pode invocar as verificações de segurança e verificações de permissão de segurança de acesso de código.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked "dirty".
trans-unit.target: O controle de Web Parts para ser marcados como "sujos".

trans-unit.source: Attempted to mark as "dirty" a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de marcar como "sujos" de um controle de Web Parts que não é gerenciado pelo pai <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de personalização não foi carregados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the personalization data of the current page has been reset (for example, a request was made to delete the personalization data from the underlying data store).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os dados de personalização da página atual foi redefinidos (por exemplo, foi feita uma solicitação para excluir os dados de personalização do armazenamento de dados subjacente).

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, it indicates that the personalization state for the current page has been reset and that extraction of personalization data from controls and subsequent save operations should be skipped.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade é definida como `true`, isso indica que o estado de personalização para a página atual foi redefinido e extração de dados de personalização de controles e as subsequentes salva operações deve ser ignorada.

trans-unit.source: Currently, this property is automatically set to `true` by the personalization infrastructure if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: No momento, essa propriedade é definida automaticamente como `true` pela infraestrutura de personalização se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that although there are no restrictions on when this property can be set, the property must be set to `true` prior to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: Observe que, embora não haja nenhuma restrição sobre quando essa propriedade pode ser definida, a propriedade deve ser definida como `true` antes de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>evento tenha efeito.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the personalization state for the current page has been reset; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estado de personalização para a página atual foi redefinido; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Switches the current page's personalization scope from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> or from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Alterna o escopo de personalização da página atual de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> para <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> para <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method toggles the currently executing page's personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Esse método alterna o escopo de personalização da página em execução no momento.

trans-unit.source: Toggling the scope results in a <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> back to the current executing page.
trans-unit.target: Alternar o escopo resulta em um <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>voltar à página atual em execução.</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method performs no operation if it is called while an export or import of a Web Parts control is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não executa nenhuma operação se ele é chamado durante a exportação ou importação de um controle de Web Parts está ocorrendo.

trans-unit.source: If a toggle scope request occurs for a page that was submitted via a `POST` request, then any query string values will be preserved during the transfer; query string parameters are not preserved if the page was submitted via a `GET` request.
trans-unit.target: Se uma solicitação de escopo de alternância ocorre para uma página que foi enviada por meio de um `POST` solicitação e, em seguida, quaisquer valores de cadeia de caracteres de consulta serão preservados durante a transferência; parâmetros de cadeia de caracteres de consulta não são preservados se a página foi enviada por meio de um `GET` solicitação.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to toggle to a scope that is not defined in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa para alternar para um escopo que não está definido no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Technically, this situation should never occur.
trans-unit.target: Tecnicamente, essa situação nunca deve ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of user capabilities from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> granted to the current user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conjunto de recursos do usuário do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> concedidas ao usuário atual.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing the set of user capabilities granted to the current user, or an empty <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary"></xref> if the user is anonymous.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>que contém o conjunto de recursos de usuário concedida para o usuário atual ou vazio <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary"> </xref> se o usuário é anônimo.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the current parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância do pai atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controle associado a esta <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with this instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class.
trans-unit.target: Use esta propriedade para determinar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controle associado a esta instância da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The current parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O pai atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref>.
